slides.title: Introduction to JavaScript Frameworks
slides.subtitle: Why Frameworks Matter
slides.content: JavaScript frameworks help developers build complex applications more efficiently by providing structure and reusable components.

slides.title: React
slides.subtitle: A Declarative Approach
slides.content: React's component-based architecture and virtual DOM make it ideal for building interactive UIs.

slides.title: Vue.js
slides.subtitle: The Progressive Framework
slides.content: Vue offers an approachable core library that scales between a lightweight tool and full-featured framework.

slides.title: Angular
slides.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Framework
slides.content: Angular provides opinionated solutions for building complex applications with TypeScript.

slides.title: Svelte
slides.subtitle: The Disappearing Framework
slides.content: Svelte shifts work to compile time, producing highly optimized vanilla JavaScript.

slides.title: Framework Comparison
slides.subtitle: Choosing the Right Tool
slides.content: Each framework has strengths that make it suitable for different types of projects.

slides.title: Emerging Trends
slides.subtitle: The Future of Frontend
slides.content: The JavaScript ecosystem continues to evolve with new approaches and optimizations.
